column4: entered into eternal rest wednesday morning at her home in corona
column5: ca with her loving son and family members by her side. born in west virginia
column6: alma was the beloved daughter of edwin and elizabeth dawson. after high school she worked in retail sales for more than 25 years. surely
column7: she will be greatly missed by her cherished children timothy (kelly) briton of corona
column8: and james briton of west virginia
column9: as well as many other dear family members and close friends. *please see funeral info for services. funeral information. intermentwill be held back in west virginia. condolencesno condolences have been left yet. leave condolence. fromemail (optional)message
